name: Hidden Objects Paris Adventure Object Time Puzzle
name_original: Hidden Objects Paris Adventure Object Time Puzzle
description:
Hidden Objects – Paris Adventure is a beautifully designed, search and finder game with numerous Parisian inspired levels and famous, historical French landmarks! Je T’aime!

Explore Paris by seeing the sights of the Seine River, Louvre, Arc de Triomphe, Eiffel Tower, high-end boutiques, Notre-Dame, Moulin Rouge, and more!

Find fun and stylish objects like Napoleon’s hat, croissants, French berets, gargoyles, macaroons, and more!

Levels vary from easy to difficult. A fun, quest challenge for Hidden Object, Puzzle, Brain & Word fans!

This Brain Challenging Adventure through Paris, France is sure to entertain! This is one Stylishly Designed App!

Hidden Objects – Paris Adventure features:
Gorgeous, Crisp Graphics reflecting Parisian Themes
3 Game Modes- Traditional, Chill, Adventure
Exciting Levels/Scenes of Hidden Object Puzzles
Artistically Crafted Levels
Zoom to Find Objects
Find Objects by Picture, Word, or Collector
Challenge Scenes with Missing Letters, Scrambled Words and Bonus Objects
Timed Challenges and Hints
Explore the City of Love


Game Modes instructions:
TRADITIONAL-
Time limits
Hint limits
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

CHILL-
Time unlimited
Hints unlimited
Picture, Word, Collector
8 Scenes (3 levels per scene)

ADVENTURE-
Time limits
Hint limits
Bonus Bonanza (words highlighted in green)
Missing Letters, Scrambled Words, Word Finder
15 Unique Levels
